price: Kandi ubwo azaba arimbuka (ajyanywe mu muriro), umutungo we nta cyo uzamumarira.
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
